data.niche_industry: Passenger Vehicles (PV), Electric Vehicles (EV) & Luxury Cars (JLR)

sector_kpis.kpi_1: Volume Growth: Flat to Negative (Recent YoY revenue decline of ~5% indicating volume pressure)
sector_kpis.kpi_2: EBITDA Margin: ~12-14% (Driven by JLR's improving profitability and premiumization)
sector_kpis.kpi_3: EV Market Share: ~65-70% (Undisputed Leader in India's EV segment)
